name: Antiheron
description:
You are the Antiheron. Try to catch as much fish as you can in a minute for your starving family to eat.

Normal fish = 1 point

Special fish = 10 points

Crocodile = Bad

You get many more points if you grab multiple fish with one lunge.

My record is 699 points. Try to beat that!

PS. I acknowledge that the game isn't amazing and that it's really lacking in content. I didn't spend my time too wisely during this gamejam, but I still had fun making it.
